A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi Director and writer Rian Johnson definitely took some risks with the middle chapter of the Star Wars Sequel trilogy.  Upon first viewing - I had a somewhat mixed reaction.  Upon 2nd viewing\, my definite response - The Movie is awesome! Great Performances pretty much across the board.  More humor than expected\, most of which lands well.  One VERY poignant scene which I won't spoil. Looking forward to Solo\,  and Episode 9!
